name: JANKEN (Jaimito)
description:
I started coding a year ago in Python.  My coding is in no way shape or form perfect, but in all honesty I wanted to finish something. 

If my code helps in some way or another, please use whatever you need from it.

HOW TO PLAY:

The objective is to beat your opponent by lowering HP to 0. You can choose either rock, paper, or scissors to start. You can then choose to attack with just that throw, use magic, or defend. If using Magic, you will be prompted to choose Fire, Water, or Earth. Using Magic will cost MP.

Click the Left Mouse Button to choose the options.

SOURCES:

  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/perfect-dos-vga-437.font
  • Images: https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles
  • Sounds: https://opengameart.org/content/sound-effects-mini-pack15
